VARIABLES.name: shift_assignment
VARIABLES.LaTeX: \text{Let } x_{i,j} \text{ be a binary variable indicating if Employee } j \text{ works on Day } i.

CONSTRAINTS.name: EmploymentRequirement
CONSTRAINTS.constraint: sum(shift_assignment[Employee][WORK_DAY] for WORK_DAY in WORK_DAYS) == EMPLOYEES_REQUIRED[WORK_DAY] for WORK_DAY in WORK_DAYS

CONSTRAINTS.name: MinDifferenceConstraint
CONSTRAINTS.constraint: abs(sum(shift_assignment[Employee]['Monday'] for Employee in EMPLOYEES) - sum(shift_assignment[Employee]['Wednesday'] for Employee in EMPLOYEES)) <= MIN_EMPLOYEES_DIFFERENCE

CONSTRAINTS.name: SundayMondayPairConstraint
CONSTRAINTS.constraint: sum(shift_assignment[Employee]['Sunday'] for Employee in EMPLOYEES) + sum(shift_assignment[Employee]['Monday'] for Employee in EMPLOYEES) >= MIN_SUNDAY_MONDAY_PAIR
